title: The Future of Meat (Rebroadcast)
description: Global demand for beef, chicken, and pork continues to rise. So do concerns about environmental and other costs. Will reconciling these two forces be possible — or, even better, Impossible™?
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
content:encoded: Global demand for beef, chicken, and pork continues to rise. So do concerns about environmental and other costs. Will reconciling these two forces be possible — or, even better, Impossible™?
